item.title: My Second Post
item.description: C# Functions public int AddNumbers(int number1, int number2) { int result = number1 + number2; if(result > 10) { return result; } } SQL Example CREATE TABLE Persons ( PersonID int, LastName varchar(255), FirstName varchar(255), Address varchar(255), City varchar(255) ); Another SQL SELECT Orders.OrderID, Customers.CustomerName, Shippers.ShipperName FROM ((Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID) INNER JOIN Shippers ON Orders.ShipperID = Shippers.ShipperID); Powershell Example write-host("using for loop") for ($i = 0; $i -le ($myList.

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.
